price: (Saa Da no boniayεfoͻ no) bεka sε: ”Adi ayε yεn! Hwan na wanyane yεn afiri faako a yεda yi? (Soro abͻfoͻ anaasε agyidiefoͻ no bɛyi wͻn ano sε): “Woi na Ahummͻborͻ Hene no hyεε ho bͻ no. Asomafoͻ no asεm no ayε nokorε”.
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰوَيۡلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرۡقَدِنَاۜۗ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū yāwaylanā man baʿathanā min marqadinā hādhā mā waʿada al-raḥmānu waṣadaqa al-mur'salūna
